trans-unit.source: Provides initialization settings for the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> XAML writer implementation.
trans-unit.target: 提供初始化设置<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"> </xref> XAML 编写器实现。

trans-unit.source: The defaults for all XamlXmlWriterSettings values are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 所有 XamlXmlWriterSettings 值的默认值如下`false`。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriterSettings"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> should always assume valid XAML input for purposes of duplicate resolution or other error checking.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定是否<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref>应始终认为的重复的解决方法或其他错误检查的目的的有效 XAML 输入。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> skips certain validation or error checks, such as throwing exceptions on duplicate members.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref>跳过某些验证或错误检查，例如重复成员上引发异常。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> throws exceptions when invalid XAML is encountered.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref>时遇到无效的 XAML，会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> should close immediately on <xref uid="langword_csharp_Dispose" name="Dispose" href=""></xref> or other operations, or whether the XAML writer should instead write the buffer output before closing.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定是否<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref>上应立即关闭<xref uid="langword_csharp_Dispose" name="Dispose" href=""></xref>或其他操作，或是否 XAML 编写器应改为写入在关闭前的缓冲区输出。

trans-unit.source: Use this setting with caution; closing immediately can result in invalid XAML that cannot be loaded again.
trans-unit.target: 使用此设置时要格外小心;立即关闭可能会导致无效不能再次加载的 XAML。

trans-unit.source: This setting influences the logic of <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, which calls `Close` on the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> or <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> when CloseOutput is `true`; or it calls <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter.Flush%2A> (again tied to the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> or <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>) if CloseOutput is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此设置会影响的逻辑<xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，哪些调用`Close`基础<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>或<xref:System.IO.TextWriter>CloseOutput 时`true`; 或它调用<xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter.Flush%2A>(重新绑定到基础<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>或<xref:System.IO.TextWriter>) 如果 CloseOutput `false`。</xref:System.IO.TextWriter> </xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter.Flush%2A> </xref:System.IO.TextWriter> </xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> immediately closes on a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Dispose" name="Dispose" href=""></xref> or similar operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref>立即关闭<xref uid="langword_csharp_Dispose" name="Dispose" href=""></xref>或类似的操作。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the remaining buffer output is written before the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> is released.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果剩余的缓冲区输出写入之前<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref>释放。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of this <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriterSettings"></xref> instance.
